original_text: showtime is one of the hapless victims of the arrogant " if we put together a wry white man and a chatty black man and give them guns , the movie will be funny " syndrome .
generated_text:
1. "The Rookies is a lazy attempt to combine a straight-laced cop with a wisecracking partner, resulting in a humorless mess."
2. "The buddy cop genre has been done to death, and 'Midnight Run' is just another tired example of a white guy and a black guy forced to work together."
3. "The 'buddy' formula has been overused and abused, as seen in the uninspired '48 Hrs.,' which tries to pass off its lack of creativity as humor."
4. "The formulaic 'Lethal Weapon' is a shallow attempt to combine a straight-laced cop with a loose cannon, resulting in a humorless and predictable film."
